name: Something Awful - Black Redesign (no ads) v1.2
description:
SomethingAwful forum redesign with a dark/black color scheme to make it easier on the eyes. Ads were removed and fonts were changed to Calibri/Consolas for easier viewing. If you do not have these fonts I suggest you get them. If you find anything Ive missed let me know.

*added styles to the search page
*fixed spoiler tags not working properly and a few other visuals
